generic_name: LEVOMEFOLATE MAGNESIUM, LEUCOVORIN, FOLIC ACID, FERROUS CYSTEINE GLYCINATE, MAGNESIUM ASCORBATE, ZINC ASCORBATE, COCARBOXYLASE, FLAVIN ADENINE DINUCLEOTIDE, NADH, PYRIDOXAL PHOSPHATE ANHYDROUS, COBAMAMIDE, BETAINE, MAGNESIUM L-THREONATE, 1,2-DOCOSAHEXANOYL-SN-GLYCERO-3-PHOSPHOSERINE CALCIUM, 1,2-ICOSAPENTOYL-SN-GLYCERO-3-PHOSPHOSERINE CALCIUM, AND PHOSPHATIDYL SERINE
adverse_reactions: ADVERSE REACTIONS: Mild transient diarrhea, polycythemia vera, itching, transitory exanthema, feeling of swelling of entire body may occur with administration of vitamin B 12 . Allergic sensitization has been reported following both oral and parenteral administration of folic acid.
dosage_administration: DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION ​: The adult dose is one capsule daily preferably on an empty stomach . As a general rule reticulocyte plasma count, folate and vitamin B 12 status must be obtained prior to treatment. Do not exceed recommended dose. Call your medical practitioner about side effects. You may report side effects by calling 337.662-5962.
indications: iNDICATIONS: EnBrace® HR is indicated in the TREATMENT of vitamin deficiency - specifically vitamin B 12 deficiency, and the PREVENTION of vitamin B 12 -cofactor deficiency, l-methylfolate. Requirements of vitamin B 9 and/or vitamin B 12 in excess of normal due to pregnancy can usually be met with oral supplementation.
